explore.from sentence: In this work , we build on the general framework of ' region embedding + pooling ' and explore a more sophisticated region embedding via Long Short - Term Memory ( LSTM ) , seeking to overcome the shortcomings above , in the supervised and semi-supervised settings .

learning.from sentence: It is designed to enable learning of dependencies over larger time lags than feasible with traditional recurrent networks .

LSTM.from sentence: That is , an LSTM can be used to embed text regions of variable ( and possibly large ) sizes .

simplify the model.from sentence: Our strategy is to simplify the model as much as possible , including elimination of a word embedding layer routinely used to produce input to LSTM .
